function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper information on how to properly wear face masks","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Provide training and guidelines on proper mask usage","Technologies":"Training materials and demonstrations","People":"Construction workers in CP","Owner":"Health and safety department"},{"Description":"Potential risk behaviors while wearing masks","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and ineffective protection","Mitigation":"Education on correct behavior while wearing masks","Technologies":"Training sessions and informational materials","People":"Construction workers in CP","Owner":"Health and safety department"},{"Description":"Lack of cleanliness and sanitization on construction sites","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission via contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of regular cleaning and sanitization protocols","Technologies":"Disinfectants and cleaning equipment","People":"Construction workers in CP","Owner":"Health and safety department"}]}
